item.title: Build AI-assisted calling workflows with Azure AI Speech and Azure Communication Services
item.description: Add speech capabilities into Azure Communication Services call automation workflows with Azure AI Speech.
item.atom:content: Add speech capabilities into Azure Communication Services call automation workflows with Azure AI Speech.

item.title: Public Preview: Test Single GraphQL Resolver in Azure API Management Portal
item.description: Customers using Azure API Management can seamlessly evaluate their GraphQL resolvers directly within the portal during the configuration phase in Azure portal.
item.atom:content: Customers using Azure API Management can seamlessly evaluate their GraphQL resolvers directly within the portal during the configuration phase in Azure portal.

item.title: Generally Available: Azure Monitor VM Insights using Azure Monitor Agent
item.description: VM Insights using Azure Monitor Agent provides various benefits like cost savings, simplified management experience and enhanced security & performance.
item.atom:content: VM Insights using Azure Monitor Agent provides various benefits like cost savings, simplified management experience and enhanced security & performance.

item.title: Azure Firewall Single-Click Upgrade and Downgrade is now in general availability
item.description: This feature allows you to upgrade your firewall without service downtime, with a single click of a button.
item.atom:content: This feature allows you to upgrade your firewall without service downtime, with a single click of a button.

item.title: Azure Firewall: Poland Central Region is now in general availability
item.description: Azure Firewall is now generally available in the Poland Central region.
item.atom:content: Azure Firewall is now generally available in the Poland Central region.

item.title: Azure Firewall: Explicit Proxy is now in public preview
item.description: This configuration allows traffic from the sending application to be directed to the private IP address of the firewall, facilitating direct egress from the firewall without the need for a UDR.
item.atom:content: This configuration allows traffic from the sending application to be directed to the private IP address of the firewall, facilitating direct egress from the firewall without the need for a UDR.

item.title: Azure Firewall: Auto-Learn SNAT routes feature is now in public preview
item.description: Azure Firewall can now learn address ranges and automatically configure them to be excluded from SNAT, to reduce time and complexity spent manually defining SNAT private ranges.
item.atom:content: Azure Firewall can now learn address ranges and automatically configure them to be excluded from SNAT, to reduce time and complexity spent manually defining SNAT private ranges.

item.title: Public Preview: Azure Log Alerts support for Azure Resource Graph (ARG)
item.description: We are now introducing support for running queries also on Azure Resource Graph (ARG) tables, and even joining data between Azure Resource Graph (ARG) data sources from your Log Analytics workspace and Application Insights resources in a single query.
item.atom:content: We are now introducing support for running queries also on Azure Resource Graph (ARG) tables, and even joining data between Azure Resource Graph (ARG) data sources from your Log Analytics workspace and Application Insights resources in a single query.

item.title: Generally Available: Trusted launch as default for VMs deployed through the Azure portal
item.description: Trusted launch is now enabled by default for VMS deployed through the Azure portal, enhancing the foundational security of these VMs.
item.atom:content: Trusted launch is now enabled by default for VMS deployed through the Azure portal, enhancing the foundational security of these VMs.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Functions .NET 8 support in Linux plans
item.description: Azure Functions now supports .NET 8 preview 7, using the isolated worker model.
item.atom:content: Azure Functions now supports .NET 8 preview 7, using the isolated worker model.

item.title: Public Preview: Azure Container Apps supports environment level mTLS encryption
item.description: You can now encrypt traffic transmitted between applications within an environment using mTLS.
item.atom:content: You can now encrypt traffic transmitted between applications within an environment using mTLS.

item.title: Generally available: Azure Container Apps jobs
item.description: You can now run production workloads that perform a task for a finite duration and exit, and schedule these workloads or run them in response to events.
item.atom:content: You can now run production workloads that perform a task for a finite duration and exit, and schedule these workloads or run them in response to events.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Container Apps supports additional TCP ports
item.description: You can now run applications that accept TCP connections on multiple ports.
item.atom:content: You can now run applications that accept TCP connections on multiple ports.

item.title: Generally Available: Azure Container Apps support for UDR, NAT Gateway, and smaller subnets
item.description: You can now define UDRs to manage how outbound traffic is routed for your container app environment’s subnet.
item.atom:content: You can now define UDRs to manage how outbound traffic is routed for your container app environment’s subnet.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Functions .NET worker cold start improvements
item.description: Major cold start improvements are available to .NET apps on the Azure Functions isolated worker model through a preview configuration.
item.atom:content: Major cold start improvements are available to .NET apps on the Azure Functions isolated worker model through a preview configuration.

item.title: Generally available: Azure Container Apps dedicated plan
item.description: You can now run your apps on dedicated workload profiles that offer more CPU and memory if needed.
item.atom:content: You can now run your apps on dedicated workload profiles that offer more CPU and memory if needed.

item.title: Generally Available: ASP.NET Core integration in Azure Functions

item.atom:content: Azure Functions now supports using ASP.NET types such as HttpRequest, HttpResponse, and IActionResult from .NET isolated function projects.

item.atom:content: You can now have dedicated maintenance for weekly AKS releases, auto upgrades and Node OS patching.

item.title: Azure Logic Apps (Standard): Upgrade to Node 18 LTS by 11 September 2023

item.title: Private Preview – DR for Shared Disks – Azure Site Recovery

item.title: Updated default TLS policy for Azure Application Gateway

item.title: Azure DevOps July 2023 updates
item.description: In July, we've delivered multiple improvements across Azure DevOps services. You can now dismiss dependency scanning alerts in Advanced Security that you believe to be a false positive or acceptable risk. In Azure Repos, we changed the default behavior to remove "Edit policies" permission when creating a new branch.
item.atom:content: In July, we've delivered multiple improvements across Azure DevOps services. You can now dismiss dependency scanning alerts in Advanced Security that you believe to be a false positive or acceptable risk. In Azure Repos, we changed the default behavior to remove "Edit policies" permission when creating a new branch.

item.title: Speech-to-text REST API v3.0 will be retired by 31 March 2026.
item.description:
Speech-to-text REST API v3.0 will be retired by 31 March 2026. Update your code that uses Speech-to-text REST API.
We recently updated the Speech-to-text REST API to version 3.1. Version 3.1 builds on the capabilities of the previous version and adds new features including language identification and multi-speaker diarization. With these enhancements, we'll retire version 3.0 of the API on 31 March 2026.
item.atom:content:
Speech-to-text REST API v3.0 will be retired by 31 March 2026. Update your code that uses Speech-to-text REST API.
We recently updated the Speech-to-text REST API to version 3.1. Version 3.1 builds on the capabilities of the previous version and adds new features including language identification and multi-speaker diarization. With these enhancements, we'll retire version 3.0 of the API on 31 March 2026.

item.description: Migrate your Classic VMs before September 6, 2023 to avoid service disruptions.
item.atom:content: Migrate your Classic VMs before September 6, 2023 to avoid service disruptions.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Application Gateway for Containers
item.description: Application Gateway for Containers is the next evolution to Application Gateway's Ingress Controller; bringing performance, scale, deployment, and feature enhancements.
item.atom:content: Application Gateway for Containers is the next evolution to Application Gateway's Ingress Controller; bringing performance, scale, deployment, and feature enhancements.

item.title: Public Preview: Firmware analysis in Defender for IoT
item.description: The new firmware analysis feature in Defender for IoT enables security teams to get deeper visibility into IoT/OT devices by providing better insights into the foundational software they are built on.
item.atom:content: The new firmware analysis feature in Defender for IoT enables security teams to get deeper visibility into IoT/OT devices by providing better insights into the foundational software they are built on.

item.title: Windows Server end-of-support (EOS): Upgrade seamlessly with Azure Migrate (Public preview)
item.description: With Azure Migrate, seamlessly upgrade legacy Windows servers while migrating to Azure, minimizing effort, downtime, and risk. By creating a copy of the server in Azure and performing the upgrade there, the impact on the original server is minimized, ensuring a secure and efficient transition.
item.atom:content: With Azure Migrate, seamlessly upgrade legacy Windows servers while migrating to Azure, minimizing effort, downtime, and risk. By creating a copy of the server in Azure and performing the upgrade there, the impact on the original server is minimized, ensuring a secure and efficient transition.

item.title: Preview: Azure Boost
item.description: Azure Boost is one of Microsoft Azure’s latest and most significant infrastructure innovations, enabling greater network and storage performance at scale, improves security, and reduced servicing impact.
item.atom:content: Azure Boost is one of Microsoft Azure’s latest and most significant infrastructure innovations, enabling greater network and storage performance at scale, improves security, and reduced servicing impact.

item.title: Public preview: Bring your own key on Ephemeral OS disk for AKS
item.description: You can now use your own keys to encrypt your ephemeral OS disks.
item.atom:content: You can now use your own keys to encrypt your ephemeral OS disks.

item.title: Public preview: Network observability add-on for AKS
item.description: You can now get complete observability into the network health and connectivity of your AKS cluster.
item.atom:content: You can now get complete observability into the network health and connectivity of your AKS cluster.

item.title: Public preview: Support for Python 3.11 in Azure Functions
item.description: Take advantage of Python 3.11 features with Azure Functions
item.atom:content: Take advantage of Python 3.11 features with Azure Functions

item.title: Public Preview: OData API type in Azure API Management
item.description: We are excited to announce the public preview of the OData API type in Azure API Management. This new capability extends the benefits and capabilities of Azure API Management to OData APIs, including the ability to secure them with standard API protections, such as authentication, authorization, and rate limiting, in combination with OData-specific policies for request validation.
item.atom:content: We are excited to announce the public preview of the OData API type in Azure API Management. This new capability extends the benefits and capabilities of Azure API Management to OData APIs, including the ability to secure them with standard API protections, such as authentication, authorization, and rate limiting, in combination with OData-specific policies for request validation.

item.title: Generally available: Event Grid upgrade enhancements for AKS
item.description: You can now receive and programmatically handle AKS generated upgrade events in Event Grid
item.atom:content: You can now receive and programmatically handle AKS generated upgrade events in Event Grid

item.title: Azure Machine Learning - Public Preview for July
item.description: New features now available in Public Preview enable you to create AI workflows that connect to various language models and data sources and use prompt flow and Azure OpenAI models to build LLM applications.
item.atom:content: New features now available in Public Preview enable you to create AI workflows that connect to various language models and data sources and use prompt flow and Azure OpenAI models to build LLM applications.

item.title: Azure Machine Learning - General Availability for July
item.description: A new feature now available in GA enables you to create compute clusters in locations that are different from the location of the workspace.
item.atom:content: A new feature now available in GA enables you to create compute clusters in locations that are different from the location of the workspace.

item.title: General availability: IoT Hub Service Upgrade
item.description: All IoT Hubs will be going through a service upgrade between July 2023 and November 2023 with potential impact to your IoT Hub.
item.atom:content: All IoT Hubs will be going through a service upgrade between July 2023 and November 2023 with potential impact to your IoT Hub.

item.title: Public Preview : Crash Consistent VM Restore points
item.description: For Azure partners and customers seeking to develop business continuity and disaster recovery solutions, crash-consistent VM restore points serve as feature-rich building blocks, offering an agentless solution available natively on the Azure platform.
item.atom:content: For Azure partners and customers seeking to develop business continuity and disaster recovery solutions, crash-consistent VM restore points serve as feature-rich building blocks, offering an agentless solution available natively on the Azure platform.

item.title: New Extended Security Updates (ESUs) enabled by Azure Arc
item.description: At Inspire, we are announcing Extended Security Updates (ESUs) enabled by Azure Arc. Customers will be able to purchase and seamlessly deploy ESUs through Azure Arc in on-premises or multicloud environments, right from the Azure portal.
item.atom:content: At Inspire, we are announcing Extended Security Updates (ESUs) enabled by Azure Arc. Customers will be able to purchase and seamlessly deploy ESUs through Azure Arc in on-premises or multicloud environments, right from the Azure portal.

item.title: Public Preview: Vector search, a feature of Azure Cognitive Search
item.description: With Vector search, Developers can store, index, and deliver search applications over vector representations of organizational data including text, images, audio, video, and more.
item.atom:content: With Vector search, Developers can store, index, and deliver search applications over vector representations of organizational data including text, images, audio, video, and more.

item.title: Hotpatch is now generally available on Windows Server VMs on Azure with the Desktop Experience installation mode
item.description: Hotpatch is now available for Windows Server Azure Edition VMs using the newly released images. Hotpatch is a feature that allows you to patch and install OS security updates to Windows Server Azure Edition VMs on Azure without requiring a reboot!
item.atom:content: Hotpatch is now available for Windows Server Azure Edition VMs using the newly released images. Hotpatch is a feature that allows you to patch and install OS security updates to Windows Server Azure Edition VMs on Azure without requiring a reboot!

item.title: General availability: Partial document update in the Azure Cosmos DB Python SDK
item.description: Modify just the required fields without having to replace the whole document with partial document update in the Azure Cosmos DB Python SDK.
item.atom:content: Modify just the required fields without having to replace the whole document with partial document update in the Azure Cosmos DB Python SDK.

item.title: General availability: Always Serve for Azure Traffic Manager
item.description: Always Serve feature for Azure Traffic Manager (ATM) is now generally available. This feature allows you to disable endpoint health checks from an ATM profile and always serve traffic to that given endpoint.
item.atom:content: Always Serve feature for Azure Traffic Manager (ATM) is now generally available. This feature allows you to disable endpoint health checks from an ATM profile and always serve traffic to that given endpoint.

item.title: Public preview: Stream Analytics No-Code Editor available in Azure Stream Analytics Portal
item.description: The no-code editor is now available in Azure Stream Analytics portal to enable building your Stream Analytics jobs effortlessly, no coding required.
item.atom:content: The no-code editor is now available in Azure Stream Analytics portal to enable building your Stream Analytics jobs effortlessly, no coding required.

item.atom:content: Customer-managed failover now supports ADLS Gen2

item.atom:content: Introducing resize capability for Azure dedicated hosts

item.title: Microsoft Dev Box is now generally available
item.description: Microsoft Dev Box is generally available now. Dev Box is a virtualized solution that empowers developers to quickly spin up self-service workstations preconfigured for their tasks while maintaining centralized management to maximize security and compliance.
item.atom:content: Microsoft Dev Box is generally available now. Dev Box is a virtualized solution that empowers developers to quickly spin up self-service workstations preconfigured for their tasks while maintaining centralized management to maximize security and compliance.

item.title: General availability: ExpressRoute private peering support for BGP communities
item.description: Set BGP community tags on traffic sent from Azure to on-premises over ExpressRoute, enabling a greater variety of hybrid network designs.
item.atom:content: Set BGP community tags on traffic sent from Azure to on-premises over ExpressRoute, enabling a greater variety of hybrid network designs.

item.category: Azure Communication Services; CPaaS; Calling; Apps; PSTN; VoIP

item.atom:content: A new set of APIs are in preview, to help developers build server-based, calling workflows.

item.title: Datadog – An Azure Native ISV Service – the most desired new features now available
item.description: Explore new capabilities with Datadog – An Azure Native ISV Service, that include a scalable solution to monitor resources in multiple subscriptions, configuration for Cloud Security Posture Management and ability to mute the monitor for expected VM shutdowns.
item.atom:content: Explore new capabilities with Datadog – An Azure Native ISV Service, that include a scalable solution to monitor resources in multiple subscriptions, configuration for Cloud Security Posture Management and ability to mute the monitor for expected VM shutdowns.

item.atom:content: The new second generation burstable VMs provide the lowest cost of entry to the Azure VM portfolio with greater performance.

item.title: Azure AD is becoming Microsoft Entra ID
item.description: Microsoft Entra ID is the new name for Azure Active Directory (Azure AD). No action is required from you.
item.atom:content: Microsoft Entra ID is the new name for Azure Active Directory (Azure AD). No action is required from you.

item.title: Azure SQL—General availability updates for early July 2023

item.atom:content: General availability enhancements and updates released for Azure SQL in early July 2023.

item.title: Azure Managed Lustre now generally available

item.atom:content: Reduce infrastructure setup with a managed file system optimized for HPC and AI workloads.

item.title: Generally available: Azure Digital Twins supports Digital Twins Definition Language version 3

item.atom:content: ADT supports defining models using the Digital Twins Definition Language version 3 (DTDL v3)

item.title: Azure’s cross-region Load Balancer is now generally available
item.description: Azure Load Balancer support for cross-region load balancing is now generally available. You can now load balance across Azure regions enabling a globally redundant architecture via Azure Load Balancer.
item.atom:content: Azure Load Balancer support for cross-region load balancing is now generally available. You can now load balance across Azure regions enabling a globally redundant architecture via Azure Load Balancer.

item.title: General availability: Azure Data Explorer adds support for PostgreSQL, MySQL, and CosmosDB SQL external tables
item.description: Azure Data Explorer has released three new types of external tables: PostgrSQL, MySQL, and CosmosDB SQL. These new external tables allow users to query data from these sources directly within Azure Data Explorer using the Kusto Query Language (KQL).
item.atom:content: Azure Data Explorer has released three new types of external tables: PostgrSQL, MySQL, and CosmosDB SQL. These new external tables allow users to query data from these sources directly within Azure Data Explorer using the Kusto Query Language (KQL).

item.title: Public preview: Azure Virtual Network encryption
item.description: Azure Virtual Network encryption allows you to seamlessly encrypt and decrypt traffic between Azure Virtual Machines.
item.atom:content: Azure Virtual Network encryption allows you to seamlessly encrypt and decrypt traffic between Azure Virtual Machines.

item.title: Azure Service Fabric 9.0 Tenth Refresh Release

item.atom:content: Azure Premium SSD v2 Disk Storage is now available in more regions and offers the most advanced general-purpose block storage solution with the best price performance.

item.atom:content: You can now ingest data directly from an event hub into a Log Analytics workspace

item.title: Public Preview: Azure Monitor Pod Sandboxing support in Container insights
item.description: Container Insights supports monitoring pod sandboxed containers. Pod Sandboxing safeguards against “Container Breakout” scenarios such as a malicious or legitimate user escaping container isolation to access host machine resources.
item.atom:content: Container Insights supports monitoring pod sandboxed containers. Pod Sandboxing safeguards against “Container Breakout” scenarios such as a malicious or legitimate user escaping container isolation to access host machine resources.

item.title: Public preview: Managed private endpoint for Azure Managed Grafana
item.description: Managed private endpoint in Azure Managed Grafana enables a customer to connect their Grafana workspace privately to supported Azure data sources. It is simple to configure and manage.
item.atom:content: Managed private endpoint in Azure Managed Grafana enables a customer to connect their Grafana workspace privately to supported Azure data sources. It is simple to configure and manage.

item.title: Public Preview: Azure Monitor Logs improved table-level RBAC

item.atom:content: Today we announce an improvement to the table-level RBAC used to assign permissions to specific tables

item.title: Public preview: Azure Monitor application insights configurable Real User Monitoring for Java
item.description: The new “browserSdkLoader” configuration in the Azure Monitor OpenTelemetry Java Distro makes it easier than ever to enable Real User Monitoring (RUM) in Application Insights.
item.atom:content: The new “browserSdkLoader” configuration in the Azure Monitor OpenTelemetry Java Distro makes it easier than ever to enable Real User Monitoring (RUM) in Application Insights.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Monitor Agent Health experience

item.atom:content: The Azure Monitor Agent Health experience is now available in preview. Identify data collection problems across your organization before they start impacting your business.

item.title: Public Preview: Azure Monitor Agent supports VM Insights in Azure Government Cloud
item.description: Azure Government Cloud customers can now enable VM Insights via the new Azure Monitor Agent, to monitor the client workload on the VMs or VMSS.
item.atom:content: Azure Government Cloud customers can now enable VM Insights via the new Azure Monitor Agent, to monitor the client workload on the VMs or VMSS.

item.title: Public preview: Sensitive Data Protection for Application Gateway Web Application Firewall logs
item.description: Protect the sensitive data getting stored in your Web Application Firewall (WAF) logs using log scrubbing on Azure’s regional Web Application Firewall running on Application Gateway.
item.atom:content: Protect the sensitive data getting stored in your Web Application Firewall (WAF) logs using log scrubbing on Azure’s regional Web Application Firewall running on Application Gateway.

item.title: General Availability: Azure Native New Relic Service
item.description: Enable full stack cloud monitoring and leverage rich deep integration capabilities between Azure and New Relic, with Azure Native New Relic Service now generally available.
item.atom:content: Enable full stack cloud monitoring and leverage rich deep integration capabilities between Azure and New Relic, with Azure Native New Relic Service now generally available.

item.title: General availability: Azure Archive Storage now available in Sweden Central
item.description: Reduce spending by storing rarely accessed data to Azure Archive Storage, now in new regions.
item.atom:content: Reduce spending by storing rarely accessed data to Azure Archive Storage, now in new regions.

item.title: Public Preview: Default Rule Set 2.1 for Regional WAF with Application Gateway

item.atom:content: Increase your security posture and reduce false positives with Default Rule Set 2.1, now in preview on Azure's regional Web Application Firewall (WAF) with Application Gateway.

item.title: Public Preview: Azure OpenAI Service On Your Data
item.description: Introducing Azure OpenAI Service on your data in public preview, which unlocks the power of OpenAI models like ChatGPT and GPT-4 with your own data. It streamlines communication, enhances customer service, boosts productivity without training, provides access to specific data sources for accurate insights, and enables seamless data connectivity, web app deployment, and transformative conversational AI experiences.

item.title: General availability: Introducing DropMappedField transformation for data mappings in Azure Data Explorer
item.description: Azure Data Explorer has added a new capability called "DropMappedField" to its data mappings. This feature allows users to map an object in a JSON document to a column while removing any nested fields that are already referenced by other column mappings.
item.atom:content: Azure Data Explorer has added a new capability called "DropMappedField" to its data mappings. This feature allows users to map an object in a JSON document to a column while removing any nested fields that are already referenced by other column mappings.

item.title: Generally Available: Azure VMware Solution Stretched Clusters with Customer-Managed Keys
item.description: Stretched clusters for Azure VMware Solution (AVS) is now Generally Available, providing 99.99% uptime for mission critical applications that require the highest availability.
item.atom:content: Stretched clusters for Azure VMware Solution (AVS) is now Generally Available, providing 99.99% uptime for mission critical applications that require the highest availability.

item.title: General availability: Read replica HA enabled Azure Database for MySQL - Flexible Server
item.description: Provision up to 10 read replicas in geo-paired regions on Azure Database for MySQL— Flexible Server.
item.atom:content: Provision up to 10 read replicas in geo-paired regions on Azure Database for MySQL— Flexible Server.

item.title: GA: Application Insights Distributed tracing support for Java Function Apps
item.description: Use the application map for a more complete view of end-to-end transactions to better diagnose issues and interactions
item.atom:content: Use the application map for a more complete view of end-to-end transactions to better diagnose issues and interactions

item.title: Public preview: Power BI integration with Azure Database for PostgreSQL – Flexible Server
item.description: Empower your organization to unlock actionable insights from your Azure Database for PostgreSQL – Flexible Server data with a Power BI integration.
item.atom:content: Empower your organization to unlock actionable insights from your Azure Database for PostgreSQL – Flexible Server data with a Power BI integration.

item.title: Azure SQL—General availability updates for mid-June 2023
item.description: General availability enhancements and updates released for Azure SQL in mid-June 2023
item.atom:content: General availability enhancements and updates released for Azure SQL in mid-June 2023

item.title: Generally available: Zone Redundant Storage for Azure Disks is now available in Japan East and Korea Central
item.description: Zone Redundant Storage (ZRS) for Azure Disks is now available on Azure Premium SSD and Standard SSD in Japan East and Korea Central.
item.atom:content: Zone Redundant Storage (ZRS) for Azure Disks is now available on Azure Premium SSD and Standard SSD in Japan East and Korea Central.

item.title: Generally Available: Azure Monitor Alert resources now visible in the Azure portal
item.description: Alert rules, alert processing rules and action groups can now be viewed in the portal alongside all Azure resources.
item.atom:content: Alert rules, alert processing rules and action groups can now be viewed in the portal alongside all Azure resources.

item.title: Microsoft Azure Load Testing supports setting up quick start tests using requests per second
item.description: You can now set up a 'quick test' to check that your endpoint can handle a certain throughput of requests per second (RPS).
item.atom:content: You can now set up a 'quick test' to check that your endpoint can handle a certain throughput of requests per second (RPS).

item.title: General availability: Azure Cache for Redis with Web App Marketplace offer
item.description: Create an Azure Cache for Redis instance in the Web App and database Azure Marketplace offer to accelerate your web application performance.
item.atom:content: Create an Azure Cache for Redis instance in the Web App and database Azure Marketplace offer to accelerate your web application performance.
